title: Thomson 9R Series 126 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV  (50PATH1010)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 TV Unit, Remote, Wall Mount, User Manual, 2 AAA Battery
product_specification.Supported Video Formats: MP4, MPEG, MPG, MKV, AVI, FLV, ASF
product_specification.Sound Mode: Standard, Music, News, Movie, Game, User
product_specification.Supported Audio Formats: MP3, MPEG1, MPEG2, MPEG2.5, AAC, HEAAC, ASF, WMA
product_specification.Other Audio Features: 6 Sound Mode (Standard, music, news, movie, game, user), Sound Output Device (TV Speaker, ARC, S/PDIF)
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Sony LIV, Zee5, Voot, HBO, Eros Now, MX Player TV, Alt Balaji, TVF, Jio Cinema, Tubi TV and Many More
product_specification.Content Providers: Google Play Movies & TV, Youtube, Prime Video
product_specification.Other Internet Features: More Than 5000 Plus Apps and Games Like Prime Video, Hotstar, Zee5, Sony LIV, Airplay, Built-in Chromecast, Google Play Store with 500,000 Plus TV Shows, Movies and Games, Google Assistant, Unlimited Content, 2.4 GHz Built-in WiFi
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Network PM44-11BP 100M Ethernet Support (10/100M, DHCP), Browser, Support HDMI-ARC
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Google Assistant Enabled Remote, Hot Keys of Prime Video, YouTube, Sony LIV, Sleek, Sylish and Smart Remote
product_specification.Other Convenience Features: Google Assistant, Lag Free Performance, Large Memory
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year Warranty on Product & 6 Months on Accessories
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Defect Arising Out of Faulty or Defective Material or Workmanship
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: The Product is Not Used According to Instructions given in the Instruction Manual. Defects Caused by Improper Use as Determined by the Company Personnel. Modification or Alteration of Any Nature is Made in the Electrical Circuitry or Physical Construction of the Set. Installation or Repair Work is Carried Out by Persons or Agency Other than Authorized by the Company. Site (Premises Where the Product is Kept) Conditions that do not Confirm to the Recommended Operating Conditions of the Machine. Original Serial Number is Removed, Obliterated or Altered from the Machine or Cabinet. Defects due to Cause Beyond Control Like Lightning, Abnormal Voltage, Acts of God or While in Transit to Service Centre or Purchaser's Residence. The Warranty does not Cover Any External Accessories (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). Dust appearing on television panel after 10 days of usage, mentioned in the Operating Instruction Manual Supplied with this Product or Any Cosmetic Parts
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience The installation will be done within 48 hours of delivery of the TV. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost.The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features.The process generally covers:Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked.Demonstration of features and settingsQuick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.Impeccable Display: Boasting Ultra HD resolution, enhanced depth, natural colors, and textures in place, this Thompson TV provides a truly immersive viewing experience.
product_description.Android 9.0: With the user-friendly Android 9.0, you can now enjoy a smartphone-like experience on your TV and harness the power of artificial intelligence and experience an interface that’s customised just for you.

review:
Netflix not available on this "So called Smart TV"
We are not able to install Netflix. because in Google Play Store Netflix not available even if you download from third party even then you will not able to watch Netflix because remote will not work support or work properly

Best TV in this price range, best value for money tv

Pros
Superb 4K Video, your WiFi or broadband should be of good speed like 100 Mbps to enjoy online videos at high resolution
Pictures are clear and crisp, the default colour setting is high or vivid so that you can reduce from settings.

Audio is loud and clear for a large living room or hall

RAM is good 2 GB and it has a quad core processor so speed wise it's good.

Casting from Mobile and Laptop is very easy and works like a charm since it has inbuilt chromecast.

Wifi and bluetooth connectivity is easy to setup.

If you have voltage fluctuation in your city/town ask company customer care if a stabilizer is required or not, in Mumbai there is no such issue so I am not using a stabilizer.


Cons
You cannot change the brightness contrast and colour when using Android apps or youtube you have to go back to TV AV mode then change

No netflix button on remote and no support to install Netflix app from Google play store, when you call Thomson customer care they will send you a link by which you can download the Netflix APK file and put it in a USB drive then connect it to TV and install the software. The Netflix app that they provide is a bit buggy since navigation is not easy in that but if you cast using your mobile or Laptop netflix to TV it works fine.

Overall I think it's a good tv

Got it as part of the sale. The picture quality is very clear and connectivity options are plenty. Using chromecast works like a charm. However the sound quality is a bit awkward. At lower volume levels there is some lag in the sound. Very helpful customer service that provides the patch for sound issue over email. After patch works seamless and very good quality. Picture colour and clarity is awesome.
All android apps work except Netflix.

The build quality and picture quality is great and the sound is also good the only con is that it does not have netflix support . Also , I did not face any issue with sound as mentioned by previous users I think they have solved it for the new units. Pretty happy i got this product at a steal price of 17699 only.

Only two points to rate the TV down.
- No Netflix by default & you can’t download / install it.
- connectivity- specifically “Bluetooth connectivity” it will keep paring & will pair when it wants. So you will much time in between to cook some snacks while watching TV.
Suggestions
- if you tends to buy this TV. Better to take sound bar along with this so you listen good sound. Though TV inbuilt speaker are good enough.
I think I bought most valuable item I got great items in very less amount Thank you Flipkart.. for provided me such a great deal..

Awesome tv.
Sound not that good though.
Amazing clarity and quality. Multiple connectivity options. Very bright screen. Minimal but workable remote controller.
Good product. Nice picture quality. Good volume.looking nice I am fully satisfied

Got my tv installed today ,was so eager given the details and onboarding features ...
As I was switching thru different features and exploring tv capabilities I found out that there was fluctuation in sound or audio of the tv , at first I thought there was problem rather defect with the audio configuration of the tv ,and it turned out to be a software glitch with the tv which the company fixed by contacting each and every buyer of the tv and notifying them on how to fix the issue ,after following some easy steps the issue was resolved and the tv just became Perfect .
Also appreciate the friendly gesture of the company .
coming on the display panel,it's just amazing ,colors are vivid also there is an option to set it according to your preferences.
Interference is smooth and easy,
No lag as of now , the processor is upto the mark .
Moreover this is not a CHINESE product .

Picture quality is awesome. Colors are more vibrant than Chinese brand realme and mi . Sound is good. The customer service person is very polite and helpful. Go for this make in India brand its value for money. Thank you Thomson and flipkart.

*** Don't buy ***
- 4, 5 stars ratings are either a scam or from buyers who never used smart tv before.
- Jeeves customer service is frustrating. They blame it on Thomson company. Told me that this brand uses faulty and cheapest quality parts imported from China that barely last a year.
- Quality-wise nowhere near other brands in the same price range.
- Low-grade HDMI, USB, 3.5, and 3 Pin Video ports.
- Use a voltage stabilizer to power this otherwise you never know what can go wrong.
- Within 2 days display backlight started flickering.
- Company-provided tv wall-mount is only good for hanging towels in the bathroom.
- Was able to connect the headset and speaker via Bluetooth but the quality of the sound is still terrible.
- Although they say it's 4k but looks only as good as Full HD.
- Very bad viewing angles, 60 degrees at max.
- White color washes out, lack of picture depth & details.
- Picture light is too bright by default. It spoils gray color. The worst part is that brightness, contrast, color controls are difficult to find. You have to switch to some HDMI input in-order to see them. Stock OS doesn't show them.
- Internal speakers are pathetic. I tried connecting 2.1 speakers using a 3.5 mm jack. It produced too much noise. Faulty port.
- Too much color saturation at 1080p and above, whereas lack of color production when the same content is viewed at a lower resolution.
- Cheapest build quality/plastic used.
- Thicker bezels compared to OATH models.
- Display panel is exposed to damage as there is no outer glass or plastic screen guard like the other models.
- No Netflix app in the play store.

Overall you will regret buying this. Please save your hard-earned money. Instead buy a used led tv of a well-known brand from a local shop or olex if your budget is so tight.

Dont buy Thomson 9R series 4k TV.

Reason
1. The picture quality is good. On the flipkart website and thomson website, they have mentioned 10bit 4k HDR and HDR10+ 60Hz display but when i connected my Xbox one X ( native 4k HDR gameplay) it detected 8bit 4k 24Hz display. People can try this to check the display. So its clear lie. Further, none of the HDMI ports are able to provide 4k experience.

2. The remote quality os really poor. It is made up of cheap plastic.
3. Those who are intrested in watching netflix, there is no chance that you can install netflix and watch series withput lag. ( i talked with netflix customer care). However, thomson gives you netflix app ( one with apotide and other with atv launcher) both apps are slugidh and it will hang tv Os or restart tv automatically.

4. There isn't any option related to HDR. Try and 4kHDR 60FPS video and difference will be visible. I'm using Galaxy note and i found the difference that there isn't any HDR option in the Tv.


Conclusion:

If you have extra money, you are free to spend on Thomson tv. Otherwise spend little more or go with EMI and and purchase standards company product.
